chunks: When we begin in Britain tonight where prosecutors say influencer brothers Andrew and Tristan Tate are charged with multiple crimes including rape and human trafficking. Prosecutors say that Andrew Tate is facing 10 charges related to three women. His brother Tristan facing 11 charges related to one woman. The brothers are dual US and British citizens. are also facing charges that include human trafficking and money laundering. They deny all of the allegations against them. They will be extradited to the UK once their case in Romania has concluded.
